OOC: You got the gist of my intent, THANKS!

BIC:

In the air sweeps fle=
w, diving and rising, looking like gnats over an 
especially ripe piece of =
fruit, only these gnats have blast cannons! 
The sweeps moved in a strange =
sort of chaotic harmony as their 
firepower blazed down into the city below=
.

Somewhere near the water's edge a few sweeps were ripped from the air 
a=
s Rodimus Prime's firepower hit one sweep and then another, twin 
explosion=
s lit the skies for a moment. However instead of clearing 
away the enemy i=
t seemed to attract their attention as few more flew 
in Rodimus' direction=
. Several red targeting lasers `painted' him as 
acid cannons fired in sick=
 unison.

Over the more damaged sections of the city a few sweeps patrolled=
 the 
grounds, red targeting beams acting as deadly searchlights scanned  
=
scorched grounds and burning buildings, looking for stragglers. 
Powerful e=
nergy beams fired at anyone they found, most missing by 
mere inches. While=
 it would be difficult to tell for most, people 
were being corralled. 

At=
 the Maximal base Cyclonus looked faintly disappointed at the lack 
of succ=
ess they had had for creating an entrance. He was about to 
give orders for=
 renewed attacks when Scourge turned to him. "Sir. I 
believe `he' has been=
 found. We do not need this place."

Cyclonus's face was grim as he nodded,=
 his shoulder mounted cannons 
dimmed as the energies were redirected. He t=
urned to Nighstrike and 
Darkfate, "You two will stay and either aquire thi=
s facility, or 
destroy it!" Cyclonus waved his hands at the squadron of sw=
eeps 
flying over the Maximal base. "They will assist you." Above, the 
swe=
eps left under the Duo's command continued to hammer the Maximal's 
base.

=
Cyclonus turned to Scourge. "Come, the time has come to gain our 
prize!" C=
yclonus leaped into the air, swiftly assuming his dreaded 
aerial mode, eve=
n as Scourge did the same. With a blast of boosters 
they both moved in the=
 direction of the quarry =85 Rodimus Prime!

A few of the sweeps flew out o=
ver the water circling warily as if 
searching for something. Red beams tra=
ced out over the water's 
surface as they began moving somewhat in the dire=
ction that Trelos 
had went. Two of them stopped as they noticed Doc and th=
e others, red 
beams advanced towards them as guns began to spray firepower=
 in their 
direction.

OOC: Is Trelos undetectable in beastmode? Also I am =
not sure who is 
standing where. Is Rodimus, Kup, Doc and not sure who else=
, standing 
together or separate?
